particleSystem
Class Repeller

java.lang.Object
  particleSystem.Repeller

public class Repeller
extends java.lang.Object

A basic Repeller class only circles that repell the Paeticles
based on: Daniel Shiffman's Nature of Code

Author:
fabianthelbind
See Also:
ParticleSystem Class, Particle Class
